My family and I have been loyal customers of Metro Shoes for many years, appreciating the quality products and service. However, our recent experience has been deeply disappointing. During a visit on 16th April, 2024, the store manager, Firoz khan, displayed a shocking level of disrespect towards my father.

This behavior is unacceptable, especially from a manager representing a brand like Metro Shoes. We, along with two other families who are regular clients, have decided to stop shopping at Metro Shoes until Mr. Firoz apologizes.

I would like to highlight the significant amount of money we have spent at your store over the years(I highly recommend that you check our purchase records). Our records demonstrate substantial contributions to your business, and it is disheartening to receive such disrespectful treatment in return.
